properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Chincoteague to Parramore Island VA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Parramore Island to Cape Charles Light VA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 2:24AM EST until February 14 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest to northwest winds 15 to 25 kt and seas 3 to 6
ft.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Chincoteague to Parramore Island
VA out 20 nm and Coastal waters from Parramore Island to Cape
Charles Light VA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 6 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM EST FRIDAY
